comment.author: 11151551@N08
comment._content:
The "TONGARIRO" a steel Passenger & Cargo vessel was build for New Zealand Shipping Co., Ltd., Lyttelton, BR
Build by : J. Elder & Co., Glasgow, yard number 280
Measurements : 389.0 x 46.0 Feet, 4,215 GRT.
Engine :  1Quadruple Expansion Steam engine
Sold in 99 as "ZIBENGHLA", to British India Steam Navigation Co., Ltd., Glasgow
Broken up at Bombay, 2nd quarter 1910
